<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// An efficient, type-erasing, non-owning reference to a callable. This is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// intended for use as the type of a function parameter that is not used</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// after the function in question returns.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This class does not own the callable, so it is not in general safe to store</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// a function&#95;ref.</span></CodeLine>
